trans_title: Ottoman Empire by Train with Alice Roberts
Ottoman Empire by Train with Professor Alice Roberts
introduction: This 5-part series reveals the intoxicating and somewhat turbulent history of the fascinating Ottoman Empire.Following the success of Ancient Egypt by Train, this time Alice Roberts takes the railways again to explore a more challenging and mysterious empire.The scale of the Ottoman Empire spanned three continents, over 70 countries and lasted 600 years.Roberts starts her journey near the Syrian border, traversing Turkey before entering the Balkans and finishing up at the empire's westernmost point, Budapest.Broadcaster: Channel 4Producer: Spark Media
